text: Roel van Hemert (born 21 November 1984 in Hurwenen, Gelderland) is a Dutch footballerRoel van Hemert biography who currently plays for ASV Geel in Belgium. ==References== ===External links=== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch footballers Category:Dutch expatriate footballers Van Hemert, Roel Category:Expatriate footballers in Denmark Van Hemert, Roel Van Hemert, Roel Van Hemert, Roel Category:FC Hjørring players Van Hemert, Roel Van Hemert, Roel Category:People from Maasdriel Van Hemert, Roel Van Hemert, Roel Category:Association football defenders
